thread.title: Chicago Cubs advance to NLCS with 6-4 win over Cards
thread.title_full: Chicago Cubs advance to NLCS with 6-4 win over Cards

title: Chicago Cubs advance to NLCS with 6-4 win over Cards
text: For the first time in their long history, the Chicago Cubs won a postseason series at Wrigley Field. Anthony Rizzo hit a solo home run in the sixth inning to break a 4-4 tie, and rookie Kyle Schwarber launched a bomb over the right field video board leading off the seventh to power the Cubs past the St. Louis Cardinals 6-4. With the victory, the Cubs punched their ticket to the National League chamionship series by winning the best-of-five division series three games to one.
